mapper.select: SELECT H.hostId, H.hostName, H.hostPwd, H.hostImage, H.hostIntro, H.hostSuper, H.hostLang, H.hostRate, H.hostYear, H.hostJob, H.hostVerified, H.hostRegDate, H.hostDelDate, O.roomId, O.roomPrice, O.roomName, O.roomAddress1, O.roomLoc, O.roomInfo, O.roomIntro, O.roomClean, O.roomPet, O.roomWPrice, O.roomCap, O.roomType, O.roomLat, O.roomLng, O.roomImage1, O.roomImage2, O.roomImage3, O.roomImage4, O.roomImage5, O.roomImage6, O.roomLikes, E.reserveId, E.guestId, E.reserveCheckIn, E.reserveCheckOut, E.reservePrice, E.reserveConfirm, E.reserveCal, E.reserveCap, E.reserveStatus, E.reservePayRate, E.reservePayAmount, E.reservePayDate, E.reservePayType, E.reserveDiscount, E.reservePoint, E.reserveBank, E.reserveAccHolder, E.reserveAccount, E.reserverApi, E.reserveRefund FROM host H INNER JOIN room O ON H.hostId = O.hostId INNER JOIN reserve E ON O.roomId = E.roomId WHERE O.roomId = #{roomId}

SELECT H.hostId, H.hostName, H.hostPwd, H.hostImage, H.hostIntro, H.hostSuper, H.hostLang, H.hostRate, H.hostYear, H.hostJob, H.hostVerified, H.hostRegDate, H.hostDelDate, O.roomId, O.roomPrice, O.roomName, O.roomAddress1, O.roomLoc, O.roomInfo, O.roomIntro, O.roomClean, O.roomPet, O.roomWPrice, O.roomCap, O.roomType, O.roomLat, O.roomLng, O.roomImage1, O.roomImage2, O.roomImage3, O.roomImage4, O.roomImage5, O.roomImage6, O.roomLikes FROM host H INNER JOIN room O ON H.hostId = O.hostId WHERE O.hostId = #{hostId}
